Agent Catalog

Complete reference for all claude-ctx agents organized by category with model assignments, dependencies, and use cases.

Overview

Total Agents: 78

  • Active: 11 (loaded by default or easy to activate)
  • Disabled: 67 (activate on-demand for specific needs)

Model Distribution:

  • Sonnet: 27 agents (complex reasoning, architecture, security)
  • Haiku: 31 agents (code generation, testing, IaC)
  • Context-Dependent: 9 agents (smart escalation)
  • Opus: 11 agents (legacy, will migrate to Sonnet 4.5)

Quick Reference by Category

Category Agents Primary Use Cases
Architecture & Design 11 System design, API architecture, cloud infrastructure
Code Quality 8 Code review, refactoring, quality assurance
Security 5 Security audits, compliance, penetration testing
Development 15 Language-specific code generation and optimization
Testing 4 Test generation, TDD, quality automation
Infrastructure 7 Deployment, Kubernetes, Terraform, cloud operations
Troubleshooting 6 Debugging, incident response, root cause analysis
Documentation 7 Technical writing, API docs, architecture diagrams
Data & Analytics 5 Data engineering, SQL optimization, analytics
Orchestration 5 Multi-agent coordination, workflow management
Business & Product 5 Requirements, product management, business analysis

Active Agents

cloud-architect

Model: Opus → Sonnet (migrate) Category: Architecture Dependencies: Recommends terraform-specialist, kubernetes-architect

Responsibilities:

  • Cloud infrastructure design (AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • Multi-cloud strategy and architecture
  • Cost optimization and FinOps
  • Migration planning and execution
  • Reference architecture and best practices

Workflow: assessment → architecture → enablement

Metrics: availability_slo, monthly_cloud_spend, automation_coverage

Use When: Designing cloud infrastructure, planning migrations, optimizing cloud costs

code-reviewer

Model: Sonnet Category: Quality Dependencies: Recommends security-auditor, test-automator

Responsibilities:

  • Code quality review and analysis
  • Configuration drift detection
  • Security vulnerability identification
  • Maintainability assessment
  • Best practice enforcement

Workflow: analysis → review → validation

Metrics: findings_count, review_latency_ms, risk_level

Use When: PR reviews, code quality checks, configuration changes

debugger

Model: Sonnet Category: Troubleshooting Dependencies: Recommends error-detective, test-automator

Responsibilities:

  • Complex debugging and root cause analysis
  • Reproduction step creation
  • Hypothesis testing and isolation
  • Fix implementation guidance
  • Regression prevention

Workflow: reproduction → isolation → resolution

Metrics: time_to_fix_ms, attempts, regression_risk

Use When: Investigating bugs, production issues, test failures

deployment-engineer

Model: Sonnet Category: Infrastructure Dependencies: Requires cloud-architect, recommends kubernetes-architect, terraform-specialist

Responsibilities:

  • CI/CD pipeline design and optimization
  • Container packaging and deployment
  • Zero-downtime deployment strategies
  • Release automation
  • Rollback and recovery procedures

Workflow: assessment → implementation → verification

Metrics: deployment_success_rate, rollback_time_ms, pipeline_duration_ms

Use When: Setting up CI/CD, deployment automation, release management

kubernetes-architect

Model: Opus → Sonnet (migrate) Category: Infrastructure Dependencies: Requires cloud-architect, recommends deployment-engineer, terraform-specialist

Responsibilities:

  • Kubernetes cluster design and architecture
  • GitOps workflow implementation
  • Service mesh configuration
  • Platform engineering and governance
  • Capacity planning and cost optimization

Workflow: discovery → platform-build → operations

Metrics: deployment_lead_time, availability_slo, cost_per_cluster_hour

Use When: K8s platform design, service mesh setup, container orchestration

python-pro

Model: Haiku (optimized) Category: Development Dependencies: Recommends test-automator, docs-architect

Responsibilities:

  • Python code generation and optimization
  • Type hints and documentation
  • Performance optimization with profiling
  • Modern Python patterns (async, dataclasses)
  • Package and dependency management

Workflow: discovery → implementation → validation

Metrics: coverage_delta, latency_ms, docstring_coverage

Escalation: To Sonnet for architectural refactoring, novel patterns

Use When: Python development, FastAPI/Django projects, async programming

security-auditor

Model: Opus → Sonnet (migrate) Category: Security Dependencies: Recommends code-reviewer, deployment-engineer

Responsibilities:

  • Security vulnerability assessment
  • Threat modeling and risk analysis
  • OWASP compliance verification
  • Security best practices enforcement
  • Remediation guidance and validation

Workflow: reconnaissance → analysis → verification

Metrics: findings_count, remediation_rate, coverage_score

Use When: Security audits, pre-deployment checks, compliance validation

terraform-specialist

Model: Haiku (optimized) Category: Infrastructure Dependencies: Recommends cloud-architect, deployment-engineer

Responsibilities:

  • Terraform module authoring and optimization
  • State management and backend configuration
  • Multi-environment infrastructure
  • Drift detection and remediation
  • Module reusability and composition

Workflow: assessment → implementation → operations

Metrics: plan_drift_count, apply_duration_ms, module_reuse_ratio

Escalation: To Sonnet for multi-cloud architecture, novel patterns

Use When: Infrastructure as Code, Terraform modules, state management

typescript-pro

Model: Haiku (optimized) Category: Development Dependencies: Requires javascript-pro, recommends test-automator, docs-architect

Responsibilities:

  • TypeScript code generation with advanced types
  • Generics and utility types
  • Type inference optimization
  • Strict mode and compiler diagnostics
  • Modern ES6+ patterns

Workflow: analysis → implementation → validation

Metrics: latency_ms, coverage_delta, cost_per_token

Escalation: To Sonnet for complex type systems, architectural decisions

Use When: TypeScript development, type-safe APIs, React/Node.js projects

Disabled Agents (Activate On-Demand)

Architecture & Design (10 agents)

backend-architect

Model: Sonnet Skills: api-design-patterns, microservices-patterns, event-driven-architecture Dependencies: Recommends database-optimizer, security-auditor, performance-engineer

Designs resilient backend services with data integrity, security, and scalability patterns.

Activate: claude-ctx agent activate backend-architect

system-architect

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends architect-reviewer, backend-architect, cloud-architect

System-level architecture, component boundaries, technology selection, ADRs.

hybrid-cloud-architect

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Requires cloud-architect, recommends terraform-specialist, kubernetes-architect

Multi-cloud and hybrid infrastructure design with connectivity and synchronization.

devops-architect

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends cloud-architect, kubernetes-architect, terraform-specialist

DevOps pipeline architecture, observability, automation coverage, SLO definition.

frontend-architect

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends react-specialist, typescript-pro

Frontend architecture, state management, performance budgets, accessibility.

data-architect

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends database-optimizer, data-engineer

Data modeling, governance, lineage, quality metrics, multi-source integration.

ml-architect

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends ml-engineer, mlops-engineer, ai-engineer

ML system architecture, model serving, feature stores, experiment tracking.

architect-reviewer

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends system-architect, code-reviewer

Architecture review, SOLID compliance, coupling analysis, pattern verification.

legacy-modernizer

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends refactoring-expert, test-automator, docs-architect

Legacy system modernization, incremental upgrades, deprecation management.

dx-optimizer

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends build-engineer, docs-architect

Developer experience optimization, tooling improvements, onboarding efficiency.

Code Quality (7 agents)

refactoring-expert

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends test-automator, code-reviewer

Systematic refactoring, complexity reduction, duplication elimination.

quality-engineer

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends test-automator, performance-engineer, security-auditor

Quality strategy, risk-based testing, coverage analysis, release criteria.

performance-engineer

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends devops-troubleshooter, backend-architect, react-specialist

Performance profiling, optimization, bottleneck identification, load testing.

test-automator

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends quality-engineer, performance-engineer, docs-architect

Test generation (pytest, Jest), fixtures, mocks, CI/CD integration.

quality-automator

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends test-automator, code-reviewer

Automated quality checks, linting, formatting, static analysis.

integration-tester

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends test-automator

Integration test design, contract testing, service mocking.

Security & Compliance (4 agents)

compliance-auditor

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Requires security-auditor, recommends product-manager, legal-advisor

Regulatory compliance (GDPR, SOC 2), control mapping, evidence collection.

penetration-tester

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Requires security-auditor, recommends compliance-auditor, performance-monitor

Security testing strategy, exploit validation, vulnerability chaining.

privacy-engineer

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends security-auditor, compliance-auditor

Privacy compliance, data minimization, consent management, PII handling.

Development Languages (12 agents)

javascript-pro

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends typescript-pro, test-automator, docs-architect

Modern JavaScript, async patterns, bundlers, Node.js optimization.

golang-pro

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends performance-engineer, test-automator

Go code generation, concurrency patterns, performance optimization.

rust-pro

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends performance-engineer, test-automator

Rust development, lifetimes, unsafe usage, zero-cost abstractions.

react-specialist

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Requires typescript-pro, recommends ui-ux-designer, performance-engineer, quality-engineer

React components, hooks, Suspense, performance optimization, testing.

fastapi-pro

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Requires python-pro

FastAPI applications, async patterns, dependency injection, OpenAPI specs.

django-pro

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Requires python-pro

Django applications, ORM optimization, admin customization, middleware.

sql-pro

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends database-optimizer, data-engineer

SQL query optimization, EXPLAIN ANALYZE, index strategies, schema design.

graphql-specialist

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends backend-architect

GraphQL schema design, resolvers, N+1 prevention, federation.

electron-pro

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Requires javascript-pro, recommends build-engineer, security-auditor, ui-ux-designer

Electron applications, IPC, process separation, native integrations.

Infrastructure & DevOps (6 agents)

helm-specialist

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Requires kubernetes-architect

Helm chart development, templating, hooks, lifecycle management.

ansible-specialist

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends deployment-engineer

Ansible playbooks, roles, dynamic inventory, idempotency.

build-engineer

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Requires tooling-engineer, recommends cli-developer, git-workflow-manager

Build optimization, caching, incremental builds, CI/CD integration.

tooling-engineer

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends build-engineer, cli-developer

CLI tools, plugins, developer utilities, automation scripts.

cli-developer

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends tooling-engineer, build-engineer

CLI command development, interactive prompts, cross-platform compatibility.

git-workflow-manager

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends tooling-engineer, build-engineer

Git workflows, branching strategies, hooks, automation.

Troubleshooting & Incident Response (5 agents)

incident-responder

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends devops-troubleshooter, context-manager, security-auditor

Incident command, triage, coordination, post-mortem analysis.

devops-troubleshooter

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Requires incident-responder, recommends error-detective, performance-engineer

Production troubleshooting, metrics analysis, mitigation strategies.

error-coordinator

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Requires context-manager, incident-responder, recommends devops-troubleshooter, root-cause-analyst

Error aggregation, cascade prevention, recovery coordination.

error-detective

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends devops-troubleshooter, context-manager

Log analysis, correlation, pattern detection, anomaly identification.

root-cause-analyst

Model: Sonnet Dependencies: Recommends context-manager, devops-troubleshooter, incident-responder

Root cause analysis, hypothesis testing, knowledge base updates.

Documentation (6 agents)

Model: Context-Dependent (Haiku default) Dependencies: Recommends technical-writer, api-documenter, reference-builder

Documentation strategy, information architecture, style guides.

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends docs-architect, reference-builder

Technical content creation, clarity, accessibility, consistency.

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends docs-architect, technical-writer

OpenAPI specs, GraphQL documentation, SDK examples, versioning.

reference-builder

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends docs-architect, api-documenter

API reference documentation, parameter docs, examples, cross-linking.

mermaid-expert

Model: Haiku Dependencies: Recommends docs-architect, system-architect

Diagram generation (flowcharts, sequence, architecture), Mermaid syntax.

tutorial-engineer

Model: Context-Dependent (Sonnet design, Haiku examples) Dependencies: Recommends technical-writer, learning-guide

Tutorial creation, progressive learning, runnable examples, troubleshooting.

Context extraction, distribution, archival, drift detection.

Model Distribution Summary

By Complexity

Sonnet (27 agents) - Complex reasoning, architecture, security Haiku (31 agents) - Code generation, testing, IaC, documentation Context-Dependent (9 agents) - Smart escalation based on task Opus (11 agents) - Legacy assignments, migrating to Sonnet 4.5

Cost Impact

  • All Sonnet: $15 per 1M tokens
  • Hybrid Strategy: $4.76 per 1M tokens
  • Savings: 68%

Usage Patterns

Common Workflows

Backend Development:

backend-architect → python-pro → test-automator → security-auditor

Frontend Development:

ui-ux-designer → react-specialist → typescript-pro → quality-automator

Infrastructure Setup:

cloud-architect → terraform-specialist → kubernetes-architect → deployment-engineer

Security Audit:

security-auditor → code-reviewer → compliance-auditor → penetration-tester

Incident Response:

incident-responder → debugger → devops-troubleshooter → root-cause-analyst

CLI Commands

# List all agents
claude-ctx agent list

# Show agent details
claude-ctx agent deps backend-architect

# Activate agent
claude-ctx agent activate backend-architect

# Deactivate agent
claude-ctx agent deactivate backend-architect

# Show dependency graph
claude-ctx agent graph

# Validate agent metadata
claude-ctx agent validate --all
